人間活動: (にんげんかつどう) - human activity
人間爆弾: (にんげんばくだん) - human bomb
人間環境宣言: (にんげんかんきょうせんげん) - Declaration of the United Nations Conference on the Human Environment (Stockholm, 1972)
人間生態学: (にんげんせいたいがく) - human ecology
人間界: (にんげんかい) - the world of humans
人間社会: (にんげんしゃかい) - human society
人間臭い: (にんげんくさい) - full of human traits; quite human
人間至る処青山あり: (じんかんいたるところせいざんあり) - home is wherever one lays one's hat; you can make your living anywhere in this world; there's room for us all in the world
人間至る所青山有り: (じんかんいたるところせいざんあり) - home is wherever one lays one's hat; you can make your living anywhere in this world; there's room for us all in the world
人間道: (にんげんどう) - humaneness; human realm
人間開発指数: (にんげんかいはつしすう) - human development index
人間関係: (にんげんかんけい) - (yoji) human relations
人間魚雷回天: (にんげんぎょらいかいてん) - kaiten; human torpedo in WW2
人集め: (ひとあつめ) - throng; gathering of people
人非人: (にんぴにん) - inhuman person; fiend; beast; brute
人面獣心: (にんめんじゅうしん) - (yoji) beast in human form
人面瘡: (にんめんそう) - mythological growth (tumour) that takes the shape of a human face
人面魚: (じんめんぎょ) - fish with a human-looking face
人頭: (ひとがしら) - skull/cranium; kanji "person" radical at top
人頭幢: (にんずどう) - Yama's pole (with a human head on the top)
人類のために: (じんるいのために) - for the sake of humanity
人類の為に: (じんるいのために) - for the sake of humanity
人類共通: (じんるいきょうつう) - common humanity; shared humanity; shared by humanity
人類学者: (じんるいがくしゃ) - anthropologist; ethnologist
人類愛: (じんるいあい) - humanism; love for humanity
人類最古: (じんるいさいこ) - oldest mankind (e.g. evidence of)
人類遺伝学: (じんるいいでんがく) - human genetics
人食いバクテリア: (ひとくいバクテリア) - flesh-eating bacteria
人馬一体: (じんばいったい) - (yoji) unity of rider and horse
人馬宮: (じんばきゅう) - Sagittarius (9th zodiacal sign); the Archer
人馬往来: (じんばおうらい) - (yoji) the passage of people and horses; coming and going of people and horses
人馴れ: (ひとなれ) - being used to people (e.g. of a young child)/being sociable; being used to humans (esp. animals)/being tame
人馴れる: (ひとなれる) - to become accustomed to people
人騒がせ: (ひとさわがせ) - person that annoys or causes trouble; false alarm
人魂: (ひとだま) - disembodied soul; supernatural fiery ball
什物: (じゅうもつ) - furniture; fixtures; utensil; treasure
仁: (jin) - humanity , benevolence (especialmente como uma virtude do confucionismo), consideration, compassion, humanity, charity; human; kernel; nucleolus
仁丹: (じんたん) - Jintan (brand-name breath mint marketed as having various medicinal properties); refreshing candies resembling BBs or metallic dragees
仁人: (じんじん) - man of virtue; humanitarian
仁侠: (じんきょう) - chivalry; generosity; heroism; chivalrous spirit; helping the weak and fighting the strong
仁侠団体: (にんきょうだんたい) - yakuza (often used self-referentially); chivalrous organization
仁兄: (じんけい) - (epistolary term in reference to a male) you
仁寿殿: (じんじゅでん) - central pavilion (of Heian Palace)
仁座鯛: (ニザダイ) - scalpel sawtail (Prionurus scalprum, species of tang found from Japan to Taiwan)
仁王: (におう) - the two guardian Deva kings
仁王立ちになる: (におうだちになる) - to raise oneself up to one's full height; to strike a daunting pose
仁王門: (におうもん) - Deva gate; temple gate guarded by fierce Deva Kings; temple gate of the Nio
仁義: (じんぎ) - humanity and justice (esp. in Confucianism)/virtue; duty; (perhaps derived from 辞儀)  formal greeting (between gamblers); (gang's) moral code
仁義をきる: (じんぎをきる) - to make a formal salutation (between gamblers); to formally greet; to pay one's respects
仁義を切る: (じんぎをきる) - to make a formal salutation (between gamblers); to formally greet; to pay one's respects
仁義忠孝: (じんぎちゅうこう) - (yoji) humanity, justice, loyalty, and filial piety
仁義礼智信: (じんぎれいちしん) - the 5 Confucian virtues (benevolence, justice, courtesy, wisdom, and sincerity)
仁義道徳: (じんぎどうとく) - (yoji) humanity and justice; benevolence and righteousness
仁者: (じんしゃ) - man of virtue; humanitarian
仁術: (じんじゅつ) - benevolent act; healing act
仁輪加狂言: (にわかきょうげん) - impromptu skit; (theatrical) farce; extravaganza
仁道: (じんどう) - the path that one should follow as a human being; the path of benevolence
